name: wt
description: wt: Simple dir watcher, including all subdirectories, support multi dirs

scripts.test-cov: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r should test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r should test/*.test.js

author: fengmk2 <fengmk2@gmail.com> (http://fengmk2.github.com)
